name: LD47 - Stuck In A Loop (Squashed Games)
name_original: LD47 - Stuck In A Loop (Squashed Games)
description:
Made in <72 hours for Ludum Dare 47

In this game, you play as an iterator variable, stuck in for and while loops for all eternity. Collect shiny semicolons, fight off errors, and avoid the impending close bracket.
